meanings.sent1: She endites a letter to her friend every week.
meanings.sent2: The author endites a new book every year.
meanings.sent3: He endites a poem that always makes everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words endites a beautiful picture in the reader's mind.
meanings.sent5: The student endites his thoughts in a journal to remember them later.

meanings.sent1: The historian endites the events of the past in his journal.
meanings.sent2: The secretary endites the meeting minutes for future reference.
meanings.sent3: The detective endites the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: The camera endites the beauty of nature in stunning photographs.
meanings.sent5: The scientist endites the experiment results in a detailed report.

meanings.sent1: The artist endites her signature on the painting.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler endites a message on the inside of the ring.
meanings.sent3: The sculptor endites his name on the statue for all to see.
meanings.sent4: The engraver endites intricate designs on the metal plate.
meanings.sent5: The craftsman endites a special message on the wooden frame.
